steps.title: Ensure that you have the necessary materials from the things you need section.
steps.content: Ensure that you have the necessary materials from the things you need section.

steps.title: Purify yourself with a bath.
steps.content: Purify yourself with a bath. While bathing, chant the names of the Lord. While ordinary bathing cleans us externally, uttering the name of the Lord purifies our mind, body and soul (trikarana shuddi).

steps.title: Mark your forehead with a tilaka (urdhva pundra) or bhasma
steps.content: Mark your forehead with a tilaka (urdhva pundra) or bhasma

steps.title: Light the lamp and place some akshinta along with flowers at the base of the lamp.
steps.content: Light the lamp and place some akshinta along with flowers at the base of the lamp.

steps.title: Blow the conch (shanka) thrice.
steps.content: Blow the conch (shanka) thrice. Sounding the conch is an auspicious omen that indicates an invitation to God and wards away all evil.

steps.title: Ring the bell (Ghanti).
steps.content: Ring the bell (Ghanti). If you do not have a conch, you may just ring the bell.

steps.title: Those having an idol, can offer ritualistic worship in the prescribed manner.
steps.content: Those having an idol, can offer ritualistic worship in the prescribed manner. The others that may not have the time and/or means to do it or have a picture of the Lord in their worship, can do it mentally.

steps.title: Keep some water in a clean vessel.
steps.content: Keep some water in a clean vessel.

steps.title: Offer water to wash the holy lotus feet (paadhya).
steps.content: Offer water to wash the holy lotus feet (paadhya).

steps.title: Offer water to wash lotus hands of Lord (arghya).
steps.content: Offer water to wash lotus hands of Lord (arghya).

steps.title: Offer water for Lord to drink (acamana).
steps.content: Offer water for Lord to drink (acamana).

steps.title: Undress the Lord, or tie a plain white cloth around like a dhoti.
steps.content: Undress the Lord, or tie a plain white cloth around like a dhoti.

steps.title: Catch the above 6 items in a bowl, and set aside till the puja is finished
steps.content: Catch the above 6 items in a bowl, and set aside till the puja is finished

steps.title: Next, bathe the Lord with the following items in sequence, one after the other:
steps.content: Next, bathe the Lord with the following items in sequence, one after the other:

steps.title: Clean the Lord and dress Him with clean clothes and ornaments.
steps.content: Clean the Lord and dress Him with clean clothes and ornaments.

steps.title: Offer flowers to the chanting of mantras.
steps.content: Offer flowers to the chanting of mantras.

steps.title: Light the wicks and show the Arati to the Lord
steps.content: Light the wicks and show the Arati to the Lord
